chapters.title: Chapter 23:  The Testing
chapters.info: Malena Aylar, p. 345 (303)—The Wisdom of Emond's Field in Nynaeve's test for becoming one of the Accepted. She is not a kindly Wisdom, even going as far as poisoning the children and then healing them to make it appear that she is helping. See also al'Meara, Nynaeve.
